mapper.select: /*LiveMapper.liveListHome*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,LI.LIVE_STATUS ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_NAME ,SS.FILE_ID AS SEL_FILE_ID ,SS.UPLOAD_PATH AS SEL_UPLOAD_PATH ,SKEY.SEL_STREAM_KEY FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN (SELECT SI.SEL_ID ,SI.SEL_NAME ,FI3.FILE_ID ,FI3.UPLOAD_PATH FROM SELLER_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI3 WHERE SI.FILE_ID = FI3.FILE_ID) SS ON SS.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID JOIN STREAMKEY SKEY ON LI.SEL_ID = SKEY.SEL_ID WHERE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_TIME,' %H:%i')) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_END_TIME,' %H:%i')) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND LIVE_STATUS = '1'

/*LiveMapper.trailerListHome*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.CATE_INDEX ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY, '%m-%d') AS LIVE_START_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SI.SEL_NAME FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN SELLER_INFO SI ON SI.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') Limit 4

/*LiveMapper.toptenListHome*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.CATE_INDEX ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY, '%m-%d') AS LIVE_START_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_NAME ,SS.FILE_ID AS SEL_FILE_ID ,SS.UPLOAD_PATH AS SEL_UPLOAD_PATH ,VI.VIDEO_NAME ,VI.VIDEO_PATH FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN (SELECT SI.SEL_ID ,SI.SEL_NAME ,FI3.FILE_ID ,FI3.UPLOAD_PATH FROM SELLER_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI3 WHERE SI.FILE_ID = FI3.FILE_ID) SS ON SS.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID JOIN VIDEO_INFO VI ON LI.VIDEO_ID = VI.VIDEO_ID WHERE LI.LIVE_START_DAY >= #{nowDateTime} - INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK(now())+6 DAY AND LI.LIVE_START_DAY < #{nowDateTime} - INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK(now()) DAY ORDER BY LI.LIVE_VIEW desc Limit 10

/*LiveMapper.getLiveInfo*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_STATUS ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LIVE_START_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_NAME ,SS.FILE_ID AS SEL_FILE_ID ,SS.UPLOAD_PATH AS SEL_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,SS.SEL_CHAT_KEY FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN (SELECT SI.SEL_ID ,SI.SEL_NAME ,SKEY.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,SKEY.SEL_CHAT_KEY ,FI3.FILE_ID ,FI3.UPLOAD_PATH FROM SELLER_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI3 , STREAMKEY SKEY WHERE SI.FILE_ID = FI3.FILE_ID AND SKEY.SEL_ID = SI.SEL_ID) SS ON SS.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID WHERE LIVE_ID = #{liveId}

/*LiveMapper.getReplayInfo*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LIVE_START_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_NAME ,SS.FILE_ID AS SEL_FILE_ID ,SS.UPLOAD_PATH AS SEL_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,SS.SEL_CHAT_KEY ,VI.VIDEO_PATH ,VI.VIDEO_NAME FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN (SELECT SI.SEL_ID ,SI.SEL_NAME ,SKEY.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,SKEY.SEL_CHAT_KEY ,FI3.FILE_ID ,FI3.UPLOAD_PATH FROM SELLER_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI3 , STREAMKEY SKEY WHERE SI.FILE_ID = FI3.FILE_ID AND SKEY.SEL_ID = SI.SEL_ID) SS ON SS.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID LEFT JOIN VIDEO_INFO VI ON LI.VIDEO_ID = VI.VIDEO_ID WHERE LIVE_ID = #{liveId}
/*LiveMapper.getSellerLiveInfo*/ SELECT SEL_NAME ,FILE_ID ,SEL_STREAM_KEY ,SEL_CHAT_KEY FROM SELLER_INFO SIN, STREAMKEY SK WHERE SIN.SEL_ID = #{selId} AND SIN.SEL_ID = SK.SEL_ID

/*LiveMapper.hometownLiveList*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.CATE_INDEX ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LIVE_START_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_NAME ,SS.FILE_ID AS SEL_FILE_ID ,SS.UPLOAD_PATH AS SEL_UPLOAD_PATH FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN (SELECT SI.SEL_ID ,SI.SEL_NAME ,FI3.FILE_ID ,FI3.UPLOAD_PATH FROM SELLER_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI3 WHERE SI.FILE_ID = FI3.FILE_ID) SS ON SS.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID JOIN REGION_ADDR RA ON LI.REGION_1_CODE = RA.REGION_1_CODE WHERE RA.REGION_1_NAME LIKE '%${location}%'

/*LiveMapper.categoryLiveList*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.CATE_INDEX ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,LI.LIVE_STATUS ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LIVE_START_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_NAME ,SS.FILE_ID AS SEL_FILE_ID ,SS.UPLOAD_PATH AS SEL_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,VI.VIDEO_PATH ,VI.VIDEO_NAME FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN (SELECT SI.SEL_ID ,SI.SEL_NAME ,SKEY.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,FI3.FILE_ID ,FI3.UPLOAD_PATH FROM SELLER_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI3, STREAMKEY SKEY WHERE SI.FILE_ID = FI3.FILE_ID AND SKEY.SEL_ID = SI.SEL_ID) SS ON SS.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID LEFT JOIN VIDEO_INFO VI ON LI.VIDEO_ID = VI.VIDEO_ID WHERE LI.CATE_INDEX = #{category}

/*LiveMapper.categoryLiveList*/ SELECT LI.SEL_ID ,LI.LIVE_ID ,LI.CATE_INDEX ,LI.LIVE_TITLE ,LI.LIVE_VIEW ,LI.LIVE_STATUS ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LIVE_START_DAY ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_START_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(LI.LIVE_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS LIVE_END_TIME ,PP.PS_INDEX ,FI.FILE_ID ,FI.UPLOAD_PATH ,PP.PS_TITLE ,PP.PS_PRICE ,PP.PS_POST_STATUS ,PP.FILE_ID AS PS_FILE_ID ,PP.UPLOAD_PATH AS PS_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_NAME ,SS.FILE_ID AS SEL_FILE_ID ,SS.UPLOAD_PATH AS SEL_UPLOAD_PATH ,SS.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,VI.VIDEO_PATH ,VI.VIDEO_NAME FROM LIVE_INFO LI LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON LI.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID JOIN (SELECT PS_INDEX ,PS_TITLE ,PS_PRICE ,PS_POST_STATUS ,FI2.FILE_ID ,FI2.UPLOAD_PATH FROM PRODUCT_POST PS, FILE_INFO FI2 WHERE PS.FILE_ID = FI2.FILE_ID AND PS_POST_STATUS = 'on' ) PP ON LI.PS_INDEX= PP.PS_INDEX JOIN (SELECT SI.SEL_ID ,SI.SEL_NAME ,SKEY.SEL_STREAM_KEY ,FI3.FILE_ID ,FI3.UPLOAD_PATH FROM SELLER_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI3, STREAMKEY SKEY WHERE SI.FILE_ID = FI3.FILE_ID AND SKEY.SEL_ID = SI.SEL_ID) SS ON SS.SEL_ID = LI.SEL_ID LEFT JOIN VIDEO_INFO VI ON LI.VIDEO_ID = VI.VIDEO_ID WHERE LI.LIVE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') OR PP.PS_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
mapper.update: /*LiveMapper.updateLiveStatus*/ UPDATE LIVE_INFO SET LIVE_STATUS = CASE WHEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(LIVE_START_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(LIVE_START_TIME,' %H:%i')) <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(LIVE_START_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(LIVE_END_TIME,' %H:%i')) >= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') THEN 1 WHEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(LIVE_START_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(LIVE_END_TIME,' %H:%i')) < DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') THEN 2 ELSE 0 END WHERE DATE_FORMAT(LIVE_START_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{nowDateTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND LIVE_STATUS IN (0,1)
mapper.select: /*LiveMapper.getLiveNowInfo*/ SELECT LI.LIVE_ID ,SK.SEL_STREAM_KEY FROM LIVE_INFO LI JOIN STREAMKEY SK ON LI.SEL_ID = SK.SEL_ID WHERE LIVE_STATUS = '1' AND VIDEO_ID = '0'
